metaDescription: Dasha is a conversational-AI-as-a-service platform that lets you embed realistic voice and text conversational capabilities into your apps or products. With a single integration, create smart conversational apps for web, desktop, mobile and call centers.

topBanner.text: Dasha in your browser with Dasha Playground!

main.title: Human-like conversational AI for developers
main.description: Dasha is a conversational-AI-as-a-service platform that lets you embed realistic voice and text conversational capabilities into your apps or products. With a single integration, create smart conversational apps for web, desktop, mobile, IoT and call centers.

tabs.title: Chat support
tabs.content: Same app designed for voice works perfectly with text without any changes. Moreover, your app can support voice and text conversations concurrently. Connect Dasha to anything on the Internet: email, SMS, Whatsapp, Discord, Zendesk, Slack, Intercom, Drift, your own widget, any chat app you want.

tabs.title: Intents in plain JSON
tabs.content: Train your custom intents in plain JSON. Change it programmatically using your data in real-time.

tabs.title: Non-scripted behavior
tabs.content:
Digression is a dialogue node to which the user can jump from anywhere in the conversation. This allows you to design human-like non-structured flows which, in mimicking human dialogue patterns, generate a multitude of unpredictable pathways in an active conversation. Anything of the following and more is possible:
Human: Extra bacon, please!
AI: Got it, extra bacon. Anything else?
Human: Yeah, do you deliver to SOHO?
AI: We do, we deliver throughout the city.
-----
Human: Do you deliver to SOHO?
AI: We do, we deliver anywhere in the city.
Human: In that case, I want extra bacon.
AI: Okay, added extra bacon. Anything else?

items.title: Conversational IVR
items.description: Replace your old-style IVR system with Dasha.

items.title: Receptionist
items.description: Automate inbound calls and schedule appointments with your customers.

items.title: Self-service
items.description: Provide self-service to your customers. This advanced demo shows how to handle a little bit more complex conversation with Dasha.

items.title: Control vacuum cleaner
items.description: This example shows how to build an assistant for controlling Xiaomi vacuum cleaner on top of Dasha.

items.title: Process invoices with OCR
items.description: Use RPA tools with Dasha - for example, Tesseract OCR, UiPath or Automation Anywhere in real-time while talking.

items.label: Design conversations
items.title: Declarative language for conversations
items.description: DashaScript is an event-driven declarative programming language used to design complex real-world conversations that pass a limited Turing test. Automate call center conversations, recreate the Google Duplex demo in under 400 lines of code or create a no-code GUI for your users that translates into DashaScript code.

items.label: Build apps
items.title: Build for any platform
items.description: If it is connected to the internet and has access to a speaker/mic, it can run a Dasha application. Any platform (Web server, browser, iOS/Android, Phone/VoIP, MacOS/Linux/Windows, Raspberry Pi, etc.), programming languages (NodeJS, Java, Python, C#, C++, whatever) can be used. Note that the beta program offers only the NodeJS SDK.

items.label: Integrate with anything
items.title: Existing Data and Business Logic
items.description: Your conversational voice/chat apps use your existing infrastructure, including databases, external services (Airtable, Zendesk, TalkDesk, etc.) and business logic. Run conversations through anything (telephone, in-app, IOT) using Dasha SDK. Feed your custom data into Dasha and consume results where they provide most value (BI, analytics, decision engines).

items.label: Dasha Studio
items.title: VSCode extension
items.description: Build, manage and deploy Dasha applications from VSCode. Enjoy IntelliSense for DashaScript, a low-code graphical WYSIWYG interface and a powerful analytics engine for syntax and errors highlighting. Ships with the Profiler which visualizes conversational outcomes to easily train and improve your AI apps.

items.label: Free tier
items.title: Free tier for Builders and Testers
items.description: You can use the fully functional free tier to kick the tires, run test calls and figure out the Dasha way of building a conversational application. Once your apps are trained, put in your credit card and go. Or decide that it’s not your thing, it’s up to you.

community.label: Developer Community
community.title: Learn, share experience, communicate
community.description: Join our developer community to hang with like-minded developers, get answers to your questions from Dasha engineers, share use cases, discuss AI, ML and algorithms and generally learn new things.

team.label: Team
team.title: Made by developers for developers
team.description: Our goal is passing voice Turing test. We're building API layer within business communications so that now it's addressable by just developers.

items.name: Vlad Chernyshov
items.bio: Vlad Chernyshov is the CEO of Dasha AI. Vlad is passionately committed to passing the Turing Test, which is one of the company's main goals. Vladislav holds a master's degree in computer science and has participated in ACM ICPC.

items.position: Chief Research Scientist, Doctor of Science, Professor, former Kaggle #1
items.name: Dr. Alexander Dyakonov, PhD
items.bio: Alexander is the Chief Research Scientist at Dasha AI. His passion for computer science and machine learning led him to the title of Kaggle Grandmaster. Alexander is a Doctor of Science with more than 20 years of experience. Being a Professor at the largest CIS university, Alexander published two books and 50 scientific articles.

items.position: Co-Founder & CTO, Assoc. Professor, ACM ICPC
items.name: Ilya Stupakov, PhD
items.bio: Ilya brings almost two decades of experience in managing engineering teams to Dasha AI. Ilya is a Ph.D. in computer science and has participated in ACM ICPC. Ilya's focus at Dasha AI is building a world-class engineering team to help Dasha pass the Turing Test.

contact.label: Beta
contact.description: With Dasha you can build: call center automation, agent enhancement / speech analytics, booking a table in a restaurant, receptionist, robot for Clubhouse / Discord, add voice control to existing mobile app, conversational IVR ...the possibilities are virtually endless!
contact.title: Get started with Dasha
